Articles.Content: If there is one thing that the modding community lacks, its structural parts that mimic the use and look of the cubic and octaganol struts, as well as the 1x1 and 2x2 plates. Why cant we have minituarized plates (Which I could probably just do with TweakScale, to be honest,) and octaganol->cubic adaptars?
Well there is these... Worked fine in 0.24.2 but have tried in .25 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69539-0-23-Stockalike-parts-for-useful-esthetics
